html: I was sad to hear of the passing of long-time Indiana Sen. Richard Lugar. I had the chance to work with him on the U.S. Feed the Future initiative; his 36-year Senate career will leave an impact on global affairs for years to come. Sending my condolences to his family & friends.

html: Every two minutes, a child loses their life to malaria. On #WorldMalariaDay the U.S. must reaffirm its commitment to eradicating malaria by supporting robust global health initiatives in the prevention and treatment of this terrible disease.
text:
Every two minutes, a child loses their life to malaria.
On #WorldMalariaDay the U.S. must reaffirm its commitment to eradicating malaria by supporting robust global health initiatives in the prevention and treatment of this terrible disease.

html: In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed. It's past time for thoughts and prayers. We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV
text:
In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed.
 
It's past time for thoughts and prayers.
 
We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV

html: The Antideficiency Act exists to protect Congress’ power of the purse. The law says an agency may not switch to a different appropriation merely because the one it chose first is now depleted. This is known as the “pick and stick rule.” Pick one and stick to it.pic.twitter.com/y5YI5AvKTm – at Rayburn House Office Building
text:
The Antideficiency Act exists to protect Congress’ power of the purse. 

The law says an agency may not switch to a different appropriation merely because the one it chose first is now depleted. This is known as the “pick and stick rule.” Pick one and stick to it.pic.twitter.com/y5YI5AvKTm – at Rayburn House Office Building

Review health and prescription drug coverage, evaluate options for next year, and choose a new Medicare Part D prescription drug plan or Medicare Advantage plan.

html: I rise in strong opposition to Rep. Hice’s amendment to cut @EPA’s Environmental Justice grants. Low-income and minority communities are disproportionately vulnerable to exposure to pollution and toxins. Cutting funds that empower these communities is unacceptable.
text: I rise in strong opposition to Rep. Hice’s amendment to cut @EPA’s Environmental Justice grants. Low-income and minority communities are disproportionately vulnerable to exposure to pollution and toxins. Cutting funds that empower these communities is unacceptable.

html: I strongly oppose the Emmer amendment, which would prevent the Forest Service and the DOI from protecting our nation’s most visited wilderness area – the BWCA. Some land is too precious to mine, and I urge my colleagues to join me in protecting this national treasure.
text: I strongly oppose the Emmer amendment, which would prevent the Forest Service and the DOI from protecting our nation’s most visited wilderness area – the BWCA. Some land is too precious to mine, and I urge my colleagues to join me in protecting this national treasure.

html: I'm glad a bipartisan group of Members of Congress joined me in opposing the Grothman amendment that would have cut funding to the NEA and NEH by over $46 million. The American people benefit immeasurably from the arts and humanities.
